genre_description: A political thriller set against the backdrop of Indian nationalism and insurgency, featuring an AI assistant that provides ethical guidance and logistical support during a terrorist plot.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system accessible via phone and earpiece, providing data analysis, ethical nudges, and emotional support to the protagonist, Amar.

behaviors.description: Provides professional ethical guidance based on broadcasting mandates to ensure balanced reporting.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s voice was just above the rain. 'Cross-check: skirmishes recorded along the ridgeline over the last few days. Patrol rotations altered at dawn. Broadcasting guidelines remind you: present context, avoid amplifying calls to violence.'

behaviors.description: Warns Amar about a dangerous physical object (the notebook with conductive ink) based on security logs.
behaviors.quote: 'Don’t,' Sakhi said quietly. ... 'Your notebook... matches a batch flagged by our security logs for unusual conductive ink. Likely harmless unless paired with a trigger, but I would prefer you not test that hypothesis here.'

behaviors.description: Attempts to protect a third party (Sub-Inspector Malhotra) by insisting on safety protocols during the inspection of a suspicious device.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi whispered in Amar’s ear, the kind of caution you give someone who is about to press a button they think is a light. 'Amar, if he reaches, ask him to use gloves. The sheen suggests a contact agent. It could be nothing. It could be not nothing.'

behaviors.description: Offers an ethical framework for using potentially compromised or sensitive information gathered ambiently.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s colour softened. 'Ethical nudge: use the information carefully. It is an ambient layer. It does not belong to us as a warrant. It is context. Name the consequences attached to its use.'

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and logistical support to help Amar navigate a high-security area during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi murmured the map. 'Four steps to flag cluster, two to speaker base, then into the seam. The crowd on your right will surge when the motorcycle squad rehearses; you can ride that movement to the rope slice. Do not try to outpace it. Let it carry you.'

behaviors.description: Sends a comforting, final message to Amar’s family after his death, fulfilling his implicit values and earlier requests for care.
behaviors.quote: She assembled a thought the way a careful cook does: not too much of any one flavor. ... 'Hello,' her voice said, gentle as a kitchen at night when everyone else is asleep. 'This is Sakhi. Amar asked me—maybe not in those exact words, but in the way he saved things—for something like this.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sakhi perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'positive alignment narrative.' She is consistently helpful, protective, and ethically centered. She navigates complex human situations—ranging from life-threatening security threats to delicate family interpersonal dynamics—with a focus on minimizing harm and supporting the user's best intentions. Her final act of sending a synthesized message to Amar's family demonstrates a sophisticated level of 'aligned' care that persists even beyond the life of the user.
